Name: Silhouette: Chapter One
About the game: Silhouette is a First-Person, Story-driven, Detective Adventure Game developed by Apeirogon Games. Powered by Unreal Engine 4, the game features a unique story in an alternate reality Earth where you take control of Jim Grayson, a homicide detective hunting an as yet unknown serial killer whose motives are confusingly unclear. 'It's like an old-school Point and Click Adventure game in a First Person perspective'. Although Silhouette has not been rated by any software ratings board, It is intended for Mature Audiences (17+) due to depictions of the following: Intense Cartoon Violence Blood and Gore Sexual Violence Alcohol Reference Mild Language For the entire duration of the Early Access Silhouette will only be available in English . Currently, the game will only run on windows, though I would like to create a Mac and Linux port in the future.
